metadata.title: OpenBench - EVMBench-Powered Smart Contract Security
metadata.description: Built on OpenAI & Paradigm's EVMBench standard. Detect honeypots, tax traps, and rug pull risks instantly.

hero.title: One-Click
hero.subtitle: Built on EVMBench, the smart contract security benchmark by OpenAI & Paradigm. Detect honeypots, hidden taxes, and rug pull risks instantly.

scanCategories.title: What Can You Scan?
scanCategories.subtitle: Supports all types of EVM smart contracts. Click any example to view a live report.

features.sectionSubtitle: Smart contract security analysis powered by OpenAI & Paradigm's EVMBench framework
features.scanDesc: EVMBench-validated honeypot detection. Instantly know if you can sell before you buy.
features.realtimeDesc: Detect hidden buy/sell taxes using EVMBench pattern matching. Avoid tokens that silently drain your funds.
features.multichainDesc: Scan tokens on Ethereum and BNB Chain with EVMBench-grade accuracy. More chains coming soon.
features.fixDesc: See top holders and whale concentration. Spot insider wallets and potential dump risks with on-chain intelligence.
features.complianceDesc: Verify if liquidity is locked. Unlocked LP means the dev can pull the rug anytime.
features.monitorDesc: Deep AI code analysis powered by the EVMBench framework. Detect 200+ vulnerability patterns in open-source contracts.

howItWorks.sectionSubtitle: Three simple steps to secure your investments
howItWorks.step1Desc: Paste the token's contract address and select the blockchain (ETH or BSC).
howItWorks.step2Desc: Our EVMBench-powered engine scans 15+ risk factors including honeypot, taxes, and contract permissions.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Get a clear, beginner-friendly safety report with a score and actionable risk checklist.

cta.title: Don't Get Rugged. Scan First.
cta.subtitle: EVMBench-powered security. Free to use. No sign-up required.

evmbench.title: Powered by EVMBench
evmbench.subtitle: OpenAI × Paradigm
evmbench.description: EVMBench is a comprehensive smart contract security benchmark developed by OpenAI and Paradigm. It evaluates AI models across 200+ vulnerability patterns including reentrancy, access control, arithmetic overflow, and more.
evmbench.feature1Desc: Comprehensive coverage of known EVM attack vectors
evmbench.feature2Desc: Benchmarked by the world's leading AI and crypto research labs
evmbench.feature3Desc: Continuous updates based on the latest exploit discoveries

scan.title: Token Security Scanner
scan.subtitle: Paste a contract address to check for honeypots, taxes, and rug pull risks
scan.scanningDesc: Checking 15+ security risk factors. This usually takes a few seconds.
scan.invalidAddress: Invalid contract address. Must start with 0x followed by 40 hex characters.

report.honeypotDesc: This token appears to be a honeypot. You may NOT be able to sell after buying. Do NOT buy this token.

liquidity.title: Liquidity Info
liquidity.lockedDesc: {percent}% of liquidity is locked. Lower rug pull risk.
liquidity.unlockedDesc: Liquidity is not locked. The developer could remove liquidity at any time!

report.title: Audit Report
report.noVulnerabilities: No vulnerabilities detected. Your contract passed all checks!

evmbench.title: EVMBench Deep Analysis
evmbench.description: AI-powered code audit using the EVMBench framework by OpenAI & Paradigm
evmbench.analyzingDesc: Scanning 200+ vulnerability patterns using the EVMBench AI engine. This may take a minute.
evmbench.noSource: This contract's source code is not verified. EVMBench deep analysis is only available for open-source contracts.

share.tweetText: {tokenName} (${tokenSymbol}) security report - Score: {score}/100 {status}. Scanned on OpenBench.

audit.title: AI Smart Contract Audit
audit.subtitle: Paste your Solidity source code, upload a .sol file, or enter a contract address. Our AI engine analyzes 15 categories of vulnerabilities, access control issues, and gas optimizations.

capabilities.howDesc: Paste or upload your Solidity source code below. Our AI engine (powered by GPT-4o) analyzes it against the EVMBench vulnerability benchmark — covering 200+ known attack patterns. You'll receive a detailed security report with a score (0-100), vulnerability list, severity ratings, fix recommendations with code, and gas optimization suggestions.

workflow.step1Desc: Paste address, upload .sol file, or enter source code
workflow.step2Desc: GPT-4o scans 200+ vulnerability patterns via EVMBench
workflow.step3Desc: Detailed findings with severity, fix code, and gas tips

detect.flashLoanDesc: Flash loan attacks, front-running, sandwich attacks

capabilities.detectMore: + 9 more categories: integer overflow, unchecked calls, DoS, delegate call injection, timestamp dependence, randomness exploits, token standard violations, centralization risks, etc.

address.description: Enter a contract address or transaction hash. We'll automatically fetch the verified source code from Etherscan/BSCScan for AI analysis.
address.found: Found contract: {name} — Source code loaded. Click "Run Security Audit" to start analysis.
address.hint: Supports contract addresses (0x + 40 hex) and transaction hashes (0x + 64 hex). Only verified (open-source) contracts are supported.

editor.label: Solidity Source Code
editor.uploadHint: Drop your .sol file here or click to browse

recentScans.title: Recent Scans
recentScans.empty: No scans yet. Scan your first token!

payment.title: Payment Required
payment.description: An AI audit requires a token payment. Please confirm the transaction below.

comingSoon.nftDesc: Comprehensive security analysis for NFT smart contracts. Detect rug pulls, fake mints, and metadata manipulation.
comingSoon.nfaDesc: Non-Fungible Asset risk assessment. Evaluate collection legitimacy, contract security, and market manipulation risks.
comingSoon.mevDesc: Detect Maximal Extractable Value risks. Identify sandwich attacks, front-running vulnerabilities, and arbitrage exploits.
comingSoon.flashLoanDesc: Flash loan vulnerability detection. Analyze oracle manipulation, governance attacks, and liquidity pool exploits.

footer.description: EVMBench-powered security. Protecting traders from scam tokens, one scan at a time.
